tool.name: Identify core set of single copy ortholog genes
tool.description: using OrthoMCL to find orthologs using reciprocal BLAST and HMM clustering

param.name: proteinlength
param.label: Minimum protein length
param.help: Proteins shorter than this length will be considers poor proteins and filtered out by OrthoMCL.

param.name: evalueexponent
param.label: OrthoMCL expect value exponent cut-off
param.help: OrthoMCL BLAST similarities with Expect value exponents greater than this value are ignored. See BLAST and OrthoMCL documentation for more details.

tool.help: This tool runs OrthoMCL (http://www.orthomcl.org) and returns the orthologous groups file.
